name: Qgis print coordinate
body:
### Welcome to QGIS print coordinate system

This plug in allow user to quickly check coordinate system of all open layers. 
Especially, with Vietnam local coordinate system VN2000, this tool will print the name and configuration (central meridian for each province) which is difficult to remember.

### Authors and Contributors

Le Thi Quynh Hoa, Green Field Consulting, ltd.
http://gfd.com.vn/

### Support or Contact
Email: hoa.lq@gfd.com.vn
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
